lines.text: Come live with me and be my love, and we will all the pleasures prove That hills and valleys, dale and field, And all the craggy mountains yield.
That was smashing Willy, smashing!
Pity you don't get well educated like Willy the poet.
Cut the cackle.
Never mind about this schneid Rhino, what about this schneid island?
He might be a bumpkin but he's still a bogie.
Starting with you brother Bikini - you're fixing the eats!
Well I'm stating right here and now that this potwatching lark is a royal load of poo.
Are my peepers getting worse or is that just a plank of wood?
Your peepers are serving you very well Brother Specs.
You're going to set yourself up all Ritz like.
You know what women are like.
Well we did, Brother Walt.
Now come on puff off the pair of you!
You must be dreaming if you think I'm dreaming. Don't you think I don't know a bit of plum duff when I see one.
It's him we've got to thank for being here.
[Walt points at a picture of Superintendent Mungo on wall]
Your benefactor?
Yeah, he's a right... benefactor.
Brother Specks, you're bellboy, get the gen on them bellringing times.
So encouraging to hear of all your hopes and plans.
Yes, we're stacked right up with hopes and plans.
'Ere you are brothers - get stuck in!
We musn't leave now Walt, I'd miss the best of my rhubarb.
She never knew that chips were made from tatters till she read that book on it.
You know the trouble with you lot - you're forgetting you're a bunch of hard-nuts, a team of pure villiams!
